Kukryniksy Cartoon of Voronsky and Polonsky, 1928
Cartoon drawn by Kukryniksi, suggesting that Polonsky's literary views had always been a shadow of the opinions held by Voronsky and Trotsky. "Na literaturnom postu," 1928, # 2, p. 71.
